about_the_game:
STORY


The setting sun stained the world.
It was beautiful, even if I could not escape the darkness that would soon come.

If you can no longer face the regrets and guilt you can't hold on to, maybe that darkness can help. Is that too selfish?
But not everyone is strong. Sometimes giving up is the closest thing to salvation. At least that's how it is for me right now.



It was supposed to...

About this game

Who can really forgive that sin?

In a nightmare of madness, she searches for abominable memories.

This is a horror action adventure game that can be played with simple movement controls and a single button.

There are no lines or sentences. You can play regardless of your location or language.

The hero is vulnerable and has no fighting skills. He makes his way through the enemy's attacks.

Solve the riddles scattered throughout the stage and collect items to reach the true ending.

E key:Action Button

Q key:Option Menu

For those who distribute

There are no restrictions, but please link to the store page and the creator's X(twitter) in the description section of the distribution.


9/13 The music included in the video was restricted for distribution and video posting on Youtube, so it was replaced with music with no problems.

content_descriptors.notes: When starting from the New Game, there is a scene in which the protagonist jumps. This depiction suggests that the protagonist jumps into a nightmare world, and is not an instruction to commit suicide. The ultimate goal of the game is to avoid a tragic ending. Also, this scene is fleeting and not grotesque. However, those who find it distasteful should be warned.

name: ENTANGLED SOULS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Core i5 9400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Explore your nightmares and avoid your mortality. The truth is hidden in the depths of your dreams. This is a horror action adventure game that can be played with simple movement controls and a single button. There are no lines or sentences. You can play regardless of your location or language.
